inclusion.criterion: Dignosis of liver cirrhosis (clinical or by liver biopsy)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatic carcinoma and/or other malignancy diseases
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Portal vein thrombosis (≥50% of the lumen)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation, with recent worsening palpable lymphadenopathy. He has had multiple treatment regimens without significant response.
